text: Yasir Al Rumayyan (born 1973) is a Saudi businessman. He is the current chairman of Newcastle United and governor of Public Investment Fund. He is currently also the Chairman of the Saudi Arabian oil company ARAMCO. He has been working there since 2016. == References == Category:Saudi Arabian businesspeople Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Newcastle United F.C.
title: Yasir Al-Rumayyan
